opportunities.title: Supermarkets
opportunities.description: This is an investment in the take-private of the fourth largest grocery chain in the UK, operating across retail, forecourt, wholesale, and food manufacturing.

opportunities.title: Media and digital content
opportunities.description: This is an opportunity to invest in the merger of a leading independent French content platform operating the entire value chain and a leading integrated German content platform.

opportunities.title: Residential project
opportunities.description: This is an exclusive investment opportunity in a 492-unit multi-family asset in the suburb of Chicago, Illinois. The property features attractive amenities, high occupancy, and limited competition.

opportunities.title: Multi-family
opportunities.description: This attractive 280-unit multi family asset features 97% occupancy within-place cashflow at moderate leverage in a proven and growing Florida market.

opportunities.title: Business center
opportunities.description: This is a joint-venture equity investment in a 584,000-ft2 historic office building in Central Loop, Chicago, within close proximity to several population, transportation, and amenity centers.

opportunities.title: Real Estate Acquisition
opportunities.description: This is an off-market acquisition of a 338-unit multi-family asset in a suburb of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The seller has completed significant improvements with a proven return on cost of 30%.

opportunities.title: Insurance
opportunities.description: This company is among India’s largest retail conglomerates with operations in home and personal care, supermarkets, fashion, logistics, general insurance and life insurance

opportunities.title: Medical Supplies
opportunities.description: This company is the undisputed leader in Australia’s medicaldevice distribution market. Its market share of 15% among distributors is triple the size of the next largest independent distributor.

opportunities.title: Media and communication
opportunities.description: Headquartered in Munich, Germany, this Project is a roll-up strategy of the German media content market alongside KKR European Fund IV, L.P.

opportunities.title: Financial services
opportunities.description: This is a co-investment in a financial services company offering a range of lending products across mortgages, auto and equipment finance, point of sale finance, and personal loans.

opportunities.title: Environmental services
opportunities.description: With over 60 locations across 20 Indian states, Singapore, the Middle East and Tanzania, this company provides environmental services and solutions.

opportunities.title: Digital publisher
opportunities.description: Co- investment in the equity of a leading digital publisher operating a pan European portfolio

opportunities.title: Digital publisher
opportunities.description: Co- investment in the equity of a leading digital publisher operating a pan European portfolio

opportunities.title: Digital publisher
opportunities.description: Co- investment in the equity of a leading digital publisher operating a pan European portfolio

opportunities.title: Media and Digital Publishing
opportunities.description: This is a co-investment alongside KKR in the equity of a leading digital publisher operating a pan-European portfolio of leading brands in digital classifieds and digital content.
